'''The Rotted Lady''' is a character in {{poe2}}.  

## Background

{{Description|A stench of rot hovers over the mênpŵgra. She points a crooked, wandlike finger at you and advances.}}
The Lady is the mistress of the island, a guardian of its adra and an ancient creature whose memory reaches all the way back to Ondra's cataclysm that engulfed the Deadfire. 

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [The Last Sanctuary](/theLastSanctuary/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [The Last Sanctuary](/theLastSanctuary/) - You can restore her through several ways (see the quest walkthrough), then she is replaced by [The Green Lady](/theGreenLady/).

[Category:Motare o Kōzi characters](/categoryMotareOKoziCharacters/)
